title: Smart Data Models - ExcST6B
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE ST6B static excitation system with PID controller and optional inner feedbacks loop.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcST6B

ilr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limit reference (Ilr).  Typical Value = 4.164. Default: 0.0

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector (K1). true = feedback is from Ifd false = feedback is not from Ifd. Typical Value = true. Default: False

kcl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limit adjustment (Kcl).  Typical Value = 1.0577. Default: 0.0

kff.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pre-control gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Kff).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Kg).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kia.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator integral gain (Kia).  Typical Value = 45.094. Default: 0.0

klr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limit adjustment (Kcl).  Typical Value = 17.33. Default: 0.0

km.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forward gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Km).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kpa.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator proportional gain (Kpa).  Typical Value = 18.038. Default: 0.0

kvd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator derivative gain (Kvd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

oelin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. OEL input selector (OELin). Typical Value = noOELinput. Default: None

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback time constant of inner loop field voltage regulator (Tg).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

ts.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier firing time constant (Ts).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tvd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator derivative gain (Tvd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vamax).  Typical Value = 4.81. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vamin).  Typical Value = -3.85. Default: 0.0

vilim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector (Vilim). true = Vimin-Vimax limiter is active false = Vimin-Vimax limiter is not active. Typical Value = true. Default: False

vimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator input limit (Vimax).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

vimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator input limit (Vimin).  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

vmult.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector (Vmult). true = multiply regulator output by terminal voltage false = do not multiply regulator output by terminal voltage.  Typical Value = true. Default: False

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 4.81. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -3.85. Default: 0.0

xc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation source reactance (Xc).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0
